column9: of woolsey passed away on wednesday
column11: 2015. doris lived to take care of her family. she took great pride in being a devoted wife
column14: and great-grandmother. she and her husband james bub carden were married in woolsey and enjoyed 63 years of marriage together

column16: and enjoyed taking trips with the lambs

column22: and douglas carden of fayetteville; daughter judy lathem of woolsey; brothers james (rebecca) lynch of woolsey and edward lynch of fayetteville; sisters betty jo (leon) morris and shirley (cecil) dunn of fayetteville; and 11 grandchildren and 17 great-grandchildren. doris life will be celebrated saturday
